settings.content: Australia’s most trusted electric scooter brand—no gimmicks, fair value, genuine local support.

settings.liquid:
2,000+ Valued Riders
1,000,000+ km Logged
700+ Five-Star Reviews

settings.title: Our Story & Mission
settings.content:
A Rainy Wake-Up Call

One wet morning in 2024, Ben and Hamlet’s rented scooter died in the middle of a ride, and they realised there had to be a better way to commute.

Crafting a Simple Solution

They found durable scooters at fair prices. A few months later Puneet joined with his marketing expertise and customer-first approach, and The Simple Commute took off.

Our Promise to You

  • Honest pricing with no surprises
  • A two-year warranty plus five-year parts availability
  • All support handled in Australia, from order to service

Ride with confidence, because your daily trip should be the best part of your day.

settings.title: Why We Exist
settings.content:
Traffic Steals Your Time

We’ve all sat in endless queues of cars, watching the clock tick away. Gridlock turns a short trip into a slow crawl and steals hours from your week.

Transport Costs Keep Rising

Train and bus fares go up more often than they go down. Parking meters, ticket machines and surge pricing add up fast—sometimes costing more than the ride itself.

Delays Disrupt Your Day

Strikes, cancellations and overcrowded services leave you stranded or cramped. When public transport fails, you shouldn’t have to wait for a refund or hope for the next bus.

What You Gain Instead

  • Glide past traffic on two nimble wheels
  • Swap costly fares and parking fees for a low flat price
  • Set your own schedule without depending on timetables
  • Rely on genuine local support whenever you need it
  • Join a community of riders who share your freedom to move

settings.title: Trustworthy Quality
settings.content: From chassis to charger, every component is vetted for durability and performance.

settings.title: Straight-Up Service
settings.content: Warranty claims, spare parts, maintenance tips—handled swiftly by our in-house team.

settings.title: Community First
settings.content: We back local e-mobility events, ride-outs and student partnerships—because we ride with you, not above you.

settings.title: Rigorous Factory Testing
settings.content: From load trials to brake checks, every scooter earns its stripes before it ships.

settings.title: Business Registration & Brand Launch
settings.content: On 9 March 2024 we filed the paperwork, locked in our name and ABN, and flipped the switch on thesimplecommute.com.au. Our vision of honest-priced, rider-first scooters was now real.

settings.title: Website Went Live & First Sale
settings.content: 19 September 2024 marked our first ever order. We sent out our inaugural electric scooter and began building a community of Aussies who’d had enough of traffic and parking hassles. On that very same night, we also launched our brand and website, making it a truly unforgettable start to our journey.

settings.title: Ads Went Live
settings.content: • On 24 September 2024 we launched our first ad campaign. It was our debut to thousands of riders scrolling their feeds—introducing fair-priced e-scooters backed by true-blue local support.

settings.title: First Viral Reel
settings.content: What started as a tongue-in-cheek clip—where a neighbour fends off a would-be car thief with an electric scooter battery—struck a chord with Aussies. Since 20 November 2024, that reel has exploded to over 3.7 million views, proving that the best stories are the ones you least expect. - Instagram

settings.title: First Container Delivery
settings.content: On 7 June 2025 our first container rolled into Melbourne, packed with hundreds of Aurora and Kaiju electric scooters. It was the start of scaling up to meet rider demand nationwide.

settings.title: Top Quality Store Badge
settings.content: In less than a year, on 7 July 2025 we earned Google’s Top Quality Store badge as Australia first and only E-scooter brand, showing recognition of our 5-star reviews, fast support and honest-priced electric scooters. It’s proof that when you choose The Simple Commute, you’re backing a brand Australians truly trust.

settings.title: Second Container Delivery
settings.content: On 26 September 2025 our second container rolled into Melbourne, packed with hundreds of Aurora and Kaiju electric scooters, plus a new model! It was all about giving more Australians the perfect scooter to match their ride.

settings.title: Astro
settings.content: Introducing the third model from The Simple Commute, the Astro. Stop overpaying for features you’ll never use. Astro is built to deliver exactly what city commuting needs: practical performance, smart features, and everyday reliability, nothing more, nothing less.

settings.title: Fair-Value Promise
settings.content: No hidden mark-ups, no phantom “discounts.” Our prices reflect real manufacturing and support costs.

settings.title: True-Blue Support
settings.content: Every question, warranty claim or spare-parts request is handled right here in Australia by people who know our roads and our weather.

settings.title: Tested for Aussie Conditions
settings.content: Each electric scooter model endures at least 1,500 km of on-road and off-road trials - Melbourne’s pot-holed backstreets, gravel trails and busy CBD lanes included.

settings.title: Long-Term Assurance
settings.content: Genuine replacement parts stocked for five years, plus a two-year warranty on frames and key components.

settings.title: Factory-Tested & Certified
settings.content: Partnering with top-tier manufacturers, every scooter meets global safety standards and Australia’s toughest quality checks, so you ride with absolute confidence.

settings.title: What Makes Us Different
settings.content:
• Fair-Value Promise
    No hidden mark-ups, no phantom “discounts.” Our prices reflect real manufacturing and support costs.
  • True-Blue Support
    Every question, warranty claim or spare-parts request is handled right here in Australia by people who know our roads and our weather.
  • Tested for Aussie Conditions
    Each model endures at least 1,500 km of on-road and off-road trials—Melbourne’s pot-holed backstreets, gravel trails and busy CBD lanes included.
  • Long-Term Assurance
    Genuine replacement parts stocked for five years, plus a two-year warranty on frames and key components.
  • Rider-Built Community
    We sponsor campus ride-share programs, local group rides and safety workshops—because we’re not just a brand; we’re fellow riders on the road.

settings.title: Factory Tested and Certified
settings.content: Partnering with top-tier manufacturers, every electric scooter meets global safety standards and Australia’s toughest quality checks, so you ride with absolute confidence.

settings.title: Hamlet Yang
settings.content: Born in 1998, the Year of the Tiger, Hamlet has always been driven by a passion for business ever since he was little. After graduating from Ringwood Secondary College and making the bold decision to drop out of Monash University at 20, he ventured into the business world, where his first venture flourished. Fast forward to early 2024, he founded The Simple Commute together with his co-founder, Ben. Now, as the founder and CEO of The Simple Commute, Hamlet is focused on making a meaningful impact on Australian commuters by offering high durability and affordable solutions. Their journey reflects a commitment to innovation and a dedication to improving everyday life.

settings.title: Ben Pickard
settings.content: As the co-founder and skilled software developer, Ben is driven by a passion for creating cutting-edge solutions that propel our company’s success. When not coding, Ben stays active with soccer, tennis, and gym, maintaining a healthy balance between work and personal life. This blend ensures a well-rounded and dynamic approach to both their professional and personal life.

settings.title: Puneet Singh
settings.content: With a background in aerospace engineering, Puneet is driven by a passion for technology and innovative solutions. Their technical expertise shines through in their meticulous approach to design and development. Beyond their professional endeavors, Puneet is an avid basketball player and gym enthusiast. They are dedicated to leveraging their skills and knowledge to contribute to a better world through The Simple Commute’s mission of being the most trusted electric scooter brand in Australia.
